1723: Fixing missing selected line on Hangar and Personnel Tabs

timeline.bodyText: Why does this order matter and others do not seem to?

replies.bodyText: It doesn't, I removed it as part of my testing and put it back in a different order... and didn't consider it worth a commit to swap back.
replies.author: Windchild292
